user.title: iQua Softener Setup
user.description: Enter your iQua app credentials and device serial number (DSN#). You can find the DSN# in the iQua mobile app under device information.

hub.title: Connect to EcoWater Account
hub.description: Enter your EcoWater credentials. Devices will be added manually.

device.title: Add Water Softener Device
device.description: Enter the device serial number (DSN#) to add it to your hub.

legacy.title: Direct Device Setup
legacy.description: Legacy mode: Enter credentials and device serial number directly.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your iQua app credentials.
error.device_not_found: Device not found. Verify that the serial number (DSN#) is correct (case-sensitive).
error.server_unavailable: Ecowater server temporarily unavailable (502 error). Please try again in a few minutes.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Ecowater servers. Check your internet connection.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for details.
error.no_hub: No hub configured. Please add a hub first before adding devices.
